      • addPhrase

        public void addPhrase(java.lang.String phrase)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Adds new word or phrase to wordlist, also check if word already exists as part of internal duplication fix.
        Specified by:
        addPhrase in interface WordListInterface
        Parameters:
        phrase - - the phrase to be added to the wordlist.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - - rethrowing the exception up the chain to caller.

      • removePhrase

        public java.lang.Boolean removePhrase(java.lang.String phrase)
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Enables a user to delete a word from the wordlist ArrayList. Searches thought the ArrayList to see if input matches ArrayList content. returns true if the word was removed and false if it was not.
        Specified by:
        removePhrase in interface WordListInterface
        Parameters:
        phrase - - phrase is the word you want to have removed.
        Returns:
        - a boolean, indicating success(true) or failure (false) to remove word.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String fileName)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Save mechanism, saves information in to a file, that matches parameter filename. The method rethrows several exceptions up the chain, because GameModel is supposed to be no text.
        Specified by:
        save in interface WordListInterface
        Parameters:
        fileName - - the name of the file to which the information is stored.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - - rethrowing the exception up the chain to caller.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - - rethrowing the exception up the chain to caller.

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String fileName)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        load mechanism, loads information from a file, that matches parameter filename. The method rethrows several exceptions up the chain, because GameModel is supposed to be no text.
        Specified by:
        load in interface WordListInterface
        Parameters:
        fileName - - the name of the file from which the information is retrieved.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - - rethrowing the exception up the chain
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - is thrown if the file contains illegal lines or fileName does.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - - rethrowing the exception up the chain

      • changeList

        public void changeList(java.lang.String fileName)
                throws java.io.IOException
        This changes the list to the file spesified as a parameter, and follows up with saving and loading of said lists.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - to be changed too
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - this is mostly to catch the exceptions from save and throw them one step up.
        java.io.IOException
